column1: Table 6-24:  Net CO2 Flux from Soil C Stock Changes in Cropland Remaining Cropland (MMT C)

column2: Notes:  Estimates after 2010 are based on NRI data from 2010 and therefore may not fully reflect changes occurring in the latter part of the time series. Totals may not sum due to independent rounding. Parentheses indicate net sequestration.
